(Uh...no.  If I seal the doors, you can't get in.  I've made it so only from 
the bridge can they be opened.  Therefore, it has to be authorized by me.  
And Plintissa has been set on enemy, as have Wraith and Kamodia, so no, that 
is wrong as well.  So just walking in doesn't work anymore like you've been 
doing)
